definition: aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
Chinese underdot (punct. used for emphasis, sim. to Western italics)

sentences.english: Develop students' professional knowledge and the ability of self-expression, communication, and collaboration in teamwork.
sentences.chinese: 著重團隊合作學習，提升表達及溝通能力。

sentences.english: John Ma highlighting the key areas to be covered under channel management strategy.
sentences.chinese: 馬世豪著重介紹營銷渠道管理策略涵蓋的關鍵領域。

sentences.english: The airline did stress on error-free tickets and other documents.
sentences.chinese: 這航空公司著重在零錯誤的機票及其他文件。

sentences.english: This text, the second in a three-book series, emphasizes listening in context to develop functional comprehension skills.
sentences.chinese: 本書著重在藉由前後文的輔助，訓練聽力的技巧。

sentences.english: The Belmont Racetrack, on the border with Queens, is one hot contender.
sentences.chinese: 與昆斯區接壤的貝爾蒙賽道是著重考慮的選址。

sentences.english: This paper addresses the classical question of the free-riding problem in a two-person managerial team.
sentences.chinese: 本文著重考察兩人管理團隊中搭便車的古典問題。

sentences.english: Dinitz in particularly stressed that israel was running out of ammunition.
sentences.chinese: 迪尼茨特別著重說明以色列的彈藥即將告罄。

definition: conspicuous/to make sth stand out/make sth prominent
axis/principal axis (in mechanics, optics, botany etc)/main axle (of engine)
to be in/to lie in/to consist in/to depend on/to rest with
because of/on the basis of/in view of/on account of
